actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide for the adoption of "The Perpetual Calendar."

summary.text: Provides for the adoption of "The Perpetual Calendar" as the official calendar of the United States, on or after New Year's Day, 1979. Authorizes the President to take appropriate administrative action to facilitate the conversion from the Gregorian Calendar presently in use. Provides for a revision of the official public holidays to conform with the Perpetual Calendar.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the adoption of "The Perpetual Calendar."
